  • public class TripleDES
extends java.lang.Object
    TripleDES Method. Before use encrypt(String) or decrypt(byte[]) decrypt(String) directly,you should use setToken(String) first.

      • Base64decoding

        public static byte[] Base64decoding(java.lang.String context,
                    int type)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Decode the Base64-encoded data in input and return the data in a new byte array. The padding '=' characters at the end are considered optional, but if any are present, there must be the correct number of them.
        参数:
        context -
        type -
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input contains incorrect padding
        java.io.IOException
